topic.title: Recommended specification
topic.shortdesc: Recommended hardware and software requirements to install and effectively operate Couchbase Server.

body.p:
The recommended prerequisites include:
Four core 64-bit x86 CPU running at 3GHz; six cores when using Cross Data Center Replication (XDCR) and Views.
16GB RAM (physical).
A local block-based storage device (hard disk, SSD). Network filesystems such as CIFS and NFS are not supported.
